scripts.validate:backend: npm run sync:backend && if [ -f backend/.venv/bin/ruff ]; then backend/.venv/bin/ruff check backend && backend/.venv/bin/ruff format --check backend && (backend/.venv/bin/mypy --config-file backend/pyproject.toml backend || echo '⚠️ Mypy found type errors'); else docker exec bedriftsgrafen-backend-dev ruff check . && docker exec bedriftsgrafen-backend-dev ruff format --check . && (docker exec bedriftsgrafen-backend-dev mypy --config-file pyproject.toml . || echo '⚠️ Mypy found type errors'); fi
scripts.validate: npm run validate:frontend && npm run validate:backend
scripts.test:backend: if [ -f backend/.venv/bin/pytest ]; then PYTHONPATH=backend backend/.venv/bin/pytest backend/tests/unit -v; else docker exec bedriftsgrafen-backend-dev python3 -m pytest tests/unit -v; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lighthouse: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && lhci autorun
